title: [Champion Suggestion] Hallow, the Enchantress
body:
Say hello to Hallow the Enchantress!

I picture Hallow as a yordle, half dressed as an angel and the other half a devil. Cutesy wings (one angel and one bat of course). Support role.

Passive - Trick or Treat
QWE have different effects depending whether they are cast on friend or foe. If a player (friend or foe) has one effect on them already active, any other skills will have diminished (50%) effect.

Q - Lift Spirits / Sink Spirits
Friend - Regenerate targets HP over time
Foe - Drain targets HP over time

W - Sugar Rush / Burnout
Friend - Movespeed boost
Foe - Slow

E - Bolster / Boo
Friend - Increase damage
Foe - Decrease damage

R - Costume Party
Hallow switches "costume" with another team member. Map icons, hp bars (only in visual), and player models are swapped.
If either player casts, auto attacks or is attacked, the spell is broken, and a small area of effect fear is created around each player.
